name: Unoriginal Space Shooter
storyline:
In the year 2XYZ
A Spaceship came out of nowhere and started to shoot at things only for one reason : Score.
Yes, it is indeed... An Unoriginal Space Shooter.
summary:
This Sonic Mania mod aims to be a mod that doesn't play nor feel like Mania at all, hence the old PC-Monochrome-like style used for the whole game.
You simply shoot things that comes at random and aim for the best score you can do !
